catch_line: Exemptions Relating To The Los Angeles 200Th Anniversary Celebration.
full_text:
EXEMPTIONS RELATING TO THE LOS ANGELES 200TH ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION.

	(a)	Notwithstanding any other provision of this Code to the contrary, no non-profit organization heretofore established to plan the Los Angeles 200th Anniversary Celebration, and formally so recognized by the City of Los Angeles, shall pay any fee or charge required by this Code for any license or permit required in connection with the Los Angeles 200th Anniversary Celebration. (Added by Ord. No. 154,677, Eff. 12/29/80.)

3.catch_line: Post War Renewal Of Licenses Of Craftsmen And Others.

5.catch_line: Effect Of Renumbering Or Redesignation Of Provisions Or Sections In Statutes Or Codes Of The State Of California Which Are Referred To In The Los Angeles Municipal Code.

6.catch_line: Violation Of Municipal Ordinances – Citation In Lieu Of Taking Arrested Person Before Magistrate.

8.catch_line: City Departments Exempt From Paying Fees Or Charges Required By This Code.

10.catch_line: Exemptions Relating To The Los Angeles 200Th Anniversary Celebration.

11.catch_line: Use Of The Metric System Of Measure As An Alternative System Of Measurement

12.catch_line:
Summary Of Fees For Bureau Of Engineering Services
Provided Pursuant To The Provisions Of This Chapter.

dublin_core.Title: Exemptions Relating To The Los Angeles 200Th Anniversary Celebration.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

EXEMPTIONS RELATING TO THE LOS ANGELES 200TH ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION. (§ 11.10)

  EXEMPTIONS RELATING TO THE LOS ANGELES 200TH ANNIVERSARY
CELEBRATION.	(a)	Notwithstanding any other provision of this Code to the
contrary, no non-profit organization heretofore established to plan the Los
Angeles 200th Anniversary Celebration, and formally so recognized by the City of
Los Angeles, shall pay any fee or charge required by this Code for any license
or permit required in connection with the Los Angeles 200th Anniversary
Celebration. (Added by Ord. No. 154,677, Eff. 12/29/80.)
